name: dragon-rush
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.x-y: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.
